author: raidensakura
description: A cog for various utilities related to Hoyoverse games
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores user provided Hoyolab account token to perform various actions on the user's behalf.
install_msg: Thanks for installing, do visit https://dsc.gg/transience for questions and support. This cog is neither affiliated with nor endorsed by Hoyoverse.
name: HoyoTools
short: A companion cog for Hoyoverse games
